meanings.definition: A type of sleeve that extends in one piece to the neckline of a garment.

meanings.sent4: His raglan sleeve was like a bridge connecting his shoulder to his wrist.
meanings.sent5: The raglan sleeve felt like a cozy hug around her arm.
